meanings.definition: A prize or other mark of recognition given in honor of an achievement.
meanings.sent1: She received many awards for her excellent grades.
meanings.sent2: The awards ceremony was a special event for all the students.
meanings.sent3: The awards made her smile from ear to ear.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled with joy as she held the awards in her hands.
meanings.sent5: The shiny awards gleamed under the bright lights of the stage.

meanings.definition: To give as a reward for merit.
meanings.sent1: The teacher awards a gold star to the student who answers correctly.
meanings.sent2: He awards a bonus to employees who exceed their targets.
meanings.sent3: The cat awards itself a treat by knocking over the cookie jar.
meanings.sent4: The sun awards the flowers with warmth and light.
meanings.sent5: The universe awards those who work hard with success.

meanings.definition: To grant as merited or due.
meanings.sent1: The judge awards custody of the child to the mother.
meanings.sent2: The committee awards scholarships to deserving students.
meanings.sent3: The dog awards himself a belly rub by rolling on his back.
meanings.sent4: The ocean awards the shore with seashells and treasures.
meanings.sent5: The forest awards those who explore its depths with beauty and tranquility.
